Title: New feature added
Content: We have added a new feature to the app. Check it out!

Title: Important update
Content: Please update your app to the latest version to avoid any issues.

Title: Scheduled maintenance
Content: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our servers. The app may be unavailable during this time.

Title: New pricing plan
Content: We have updated our pricing plans. Please visit our website for more information.

Title: Holiday hours
Content: Our customer support team will have reduced hours during the upcoming holiday. We apologize for any inconvenience.
